page.title: 14FASHION IN EXMOUTH
page.content: Fashion is continualy changing but nearly anything is fashionable in the eighties. Ladies and children wear mini skirts and below the knee skirts.Most { {clothes}are pastel coloured but some are brightly coloured.Trousers are worn baggy but narrow round the ankle. {Jackets}have big padded shoulders, patch pockets and one big button. Children wear wedged {shoes}but older people prefer to wear higher heels. Colours are usually red or white. Men wear baggy trousers with pleats at the top and narrow round the ankle. Young men wear light pink, yellow or blue trousers .They wear jeans very tight. Men of all ages wear smart jackets and some leather jackets. Shoes are pastel coloured but some are brightly coloured .
